name: Survival Messenger Adventure
overview: A further development on the concept of Survival Messenger V1.1, with many more rooms, degrees of freedom and much higher complexity. A text adventure created by the teams at The 7th Division and Vintage Computing Carinthia. You wake up with a cramp starting in your left toe and sand in your mouth. What has happened you can not remember. Wind brings a salty breeze and on an island nobody else is there.You are stranded on an unknown island and you find a mobile phone where strangers, who are more or less attentive, give you advice via instant chat.
